metadata.title: CVE-2021-22885 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.description: A possible information disclosure / unintended method execution vulnerability in Action Pack >= 2.0.0 when using the `redirect_to` or `polymorphic_url`helper with untrusted user input.

notes.note: seth-arnold> In Oneiric-Saucy, rails package is just for transition; The rails package contains actual code from vivid onward

criterions.comment: rails package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
